blackengine.userInput

Class KeyActionMapper<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • blackengine.userInput.KeyActionMapper<T>

  • public class KeyActionMapper<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    An instance of KeyActionMapper can be used to tie actions to certain keyboard states or keyboard events.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KeyActionMapper(java.util.HashMap<java.util.function.BooleanSupplier,T> keyActionMap, java.util.HashMap<java.util.function.BooleanSupplier,T> eventActionMap)
      Default constructor for creating a new instance of KeyActionMapper.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T getAction(java.util.function.BooleanSupplier key)
      Getter for a specific action that matches the specified boolean supplier that checks for state.
      java.util.Iterator<T> getActionIterator()
      Getter for all actions that have matching boolean suppliers for checking state in this instance of KeyAcctionMapper.
      T getEventAction(java.util.function.BooleanSupplier key)
      Getter for a specific action that matches the specified boolean supplier that checks for keyboard events.
      java.util.Iterator<T> getEventActionIterator()
      Getter for all actions that have matching boolean suppliers for checking keyboard events in this instance of KeyAcctionMapper.
      java.util.Iterator<java.util.function.BooleanSupplier> getMappedEventIterator()
      Returns an iterator of all boolean suppliers that check for keyboard events.
      java.util.Iterator<java.util.function.BooleanSupplier> getMappedKeyIterator()
      Returns an iterator of all boolean suppliers that check for state.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • KeyActionMapper

        public KeyActionMapper(java.util.HashMap<java.util.function.BooleanSupplier,T> keyActionMap,
                       java.util.HashMap<java.util.function.BooleanSupplier,T> eventActionMap)
        Default constructor for creating a new instance of KeyActionMapper.
        Parameters:
        keyActionMap - An instance of HashMap that maps a boolean supplier that checks the state to any defined action.
        eventActionMap - An instance of HashMap that maps a boolean supplier that checks for keyboard events to any defined action.

    • Method Detail

      • getMappedKeyIterator

        public java.util.Iterator<java.util.function.BooleanSupplier> getMappedKeyIterator()
        Returns an iterator of all boolean suppliers that check for state.
        Returns:
        An instance of Iterator<BooleanSupplier>.

      • getMappedEventIterator

        public java.util.Iterator<java.util.function.BooleanSupplier> getMappedEventIterator()
        Returns an iterator of all boolean suppliers that check for keyboard events.
        Returns:
        An instance of Iterator<BooleanSupplier>.

      • getActionIterator

        public java.util.Iterator<T> getActionIterator()
        Getter for all actions that have matching boolean suppliers for checking state in this instance of KeyAcctionMapper.
        Returns:
        An instance of Iterator<T>.

      • getEventActionIterator

        public java.util.Iterator<T> getEventActionIterator()
        Getter for all actions that have matching boolean suppliers for checking keyboard events in this instance of KeyAcctionMapper.
        Returns:
        An instance of Iterator<T>.

      • getAction

        public T getAction(java.util.function.BooleanSupplier key)
        Getter for a specific action that matches the specified boolean supplier that checks for state.
        Parameters:
        key - The boolean supplier that will be used to look up its action.
        Returns:
        An instance of T, representing the action that will be sent out upon satisfaction of the boolean supplier.

      • getEventAction

        public T getEventAction(java.util.function.BooleanSupplier key)
        Getter for a specific action that matches the specified boolean supplier that checks for keyboard events.
        Parameters:
        key - The boolean supplier that will be used to look up its action.
        Returns:
        An instance of T, representing the action that will be sent out upon satisfaction of the boolean supplier.
